en.use: Use in psoriatic patients. The total PASI is the sum of PASI for each body region that includes head/neck, upper limbs, trunk, and lower limbs.
en.misuse: Not to be used if lesions involve less than 3% of the body surface area (BSA).

other_details.references: Mease PJ. Measures of psoriatic arthritis: Tender and Swollen Joint Assessment, Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI), Nail Psoriasis Severity Index (NAPSI), Modified Nail Psoriasis Severity Index (mNAPSI), Mander/Newcastle Enthesitis Index (MEI), Leeds Enthesitis Index (LEI), Spondyloarthritis Research Consortium of Canada (SPARCC), Maastricht Ankylosing Spondylitis Enthesis Score (MASES), Leeds Dactylitis Index (LDI), Patient Global for Psoriatic Arthritis, Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI), Psoriatic Arthritis Quality of Life (PsAQOL), Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue (FACIT-F), Psoriatic Arthritis Response Criteria (PsARC), Psoriatic Arthritis Joint Activity Index (PsAJAI), Disease Activity in Psoriatic Arthritis (DAPSA), and Composite Psoriatic Disease Activity Index (CPDAI). Arthritis Care Res (Hoboken). 2011 Nov;63 Suppl 11:S64-85. doi: 10.1002/acr.20577. PMID: 22588772.
other_details.en: Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI) is a quantitative assessment of psoriasis lesion burden based on the severity of erythema, induration, and desquamation and on the amount of body surface area involved.

then: $gt0020|PASI for head region|.magnitude = ( ( $gt0003|Head - Erythema|.value + $gt0004|Head - Induration|.value + $gt0005|Head - Desquamation|.value ) * $gt0006|Head - BSA involvement|.value ) * 0.1
$gt0021|PASI for trunk region|.magnitude = (($gt0007|Trunk - Erythema|.value + $gt0008|Trunk - Induration|.value + $gt0009|Trunk - Desquamation|.value) * $gt0010|Trunk - BSA involvement|.value) * 0.3

$gt0022|PASI for upper extremities region|.magnitude = (($gt0011|Upper extremities - Erythema|.value + $gt0012|Upper extremities - Induration|.value + $gt0013|Upper extremities - Desquamation|.value) * $gt0014|Upper extremities - BSA involvement|.value) * 0.2

$gt0023|PASI for lower extremities region|.magnitude = (($gt0015|Lower extremities - Erythema|.value + $gt0016|Lower extremities - Induration|.value + $gt0017|Lower extremities - Desquamation|.value) * $gt0018|Lower extremities - BSA involvement|.value) * 0.4

$gt0024|Total PASI|.magnitude = $gt0020|PASI for head region|.magnitude + $gt0021|PASI for trunk region|.magnitude + $gt0022|PASI for upper extremities region|.magnitude + $gt0023|PASI for lower extremities region|.magnitude

gt0001.description: Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI) is a quantitative assessment of psoriasis lesion burden based on the severity of erythema, induration, and desquamation and on the amount of body surface area involved.

gt0027.text: Calculate PASI for upper extremities region

gt0028.text: Calculate PASI for lower extremities region
